General.Name: Zhejiang Baida Precision Mnfg
General.Description: Zhejiang Baida Precision Manufacturing Corp. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of compressor and auto parts in China. It offers air-conditioning compressors, refrigerator compressors, air compressors, blades, balance blocks, auto parts, hardware, machinery, and equipment and electrical accessories. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taizhou, China.
